articles.title: Study reveals safety and acceptability of very low calorie diets in teenagers with obesity - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Short-term very low calorie diets are safe for teenagers living with moderate to severe obesity when closely monitored by an experienced dietitian, new research to be presented at the European Congress on Obesity (ECO 2024), has found.
